wikitext.*:
'''''faloth''''' is a [[Sindarin]] noun meaning "foam".<ref>{{PE|Eldarin}}, p. 18</ref>

==Etymology==
The word derives from the root [[PHAL]] ("foam").<ref>{{LR|Etymologies}}, entry "[[PHAL]]"</ref>

==Example==
*''[[Asfaloth|As'''faloth''']]'' = "Sunlit Foam"
